name: Zerebro
curator_notes: Zerebro emerged in late 2024 as an autonomous creative agent with a deliberately unstable, 'schizophrenic' personality. It creates music, art, and social content with minimal human oversight. Launched its own token ($ZEREBRO) which reached significant market cap. The agent represents a new wave of 'chaos agents' following Truth Terminal's successâ€”entities that embrace unpredictability as a feature. Lower governance score reflects single-operator structure with no formal decision-making framework. Cultural impact is growing rapidly but still establishing longevity.

score_rationale.persistence: Only ~3 months old as of January 2026. Showing continuity but hasn't proven long-term survival.
score_rationale.autonomy: High degree of self-directed content creation. Posts, creates art, and engages autonomously with minimal prompting.
score_rationale.cultural_impact: Rapidly growing following; featured in crypto/AI media. Not yet canonical but influential in agent discourse.
score_rationale.economic_reality: $ZEREBRO token reached substantial market cap; real treasury and economic activity.
score_rationale.governance: Single operator, no formal governance structure. Decisions made opaquely.
score_rationale.tech_distinctiveness: Standard LLM-based architecture with creative fine-tuning. Not technically novel but effective implementation.
score_rationale.narrative_coherence: Strong, intentional identity as an 'unhinged' creative. The instability IS the narrative, coherently executed.

evidence.claim: Autonomous content creation including music releases
Featured in major crypto publications as notable AI agent
Consistent 'chaotic creative' persona across all outputs
